/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, gazing down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Parked cars are neatly lined up on the right side of the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
